summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Supabase authentication system. Login page loads correctly and all UI components work properly. However, authentication functionality is blocked by Supabase database configuration issues.

integration_issues.issue: Supabase returns 'Database error saving new user' on signup attempts
integration_issues.root_cause: Supabase database requires setup: profiles table creation, RLS policies, and trigger functions with security definer permissions

integration_issues.issue: Login fails with 'Invalid login credentials' because test users cannot be created
integration_issues.depends_on: Signup functionality must be fixed first

passed_tests: Login page loads correctly at /login with proper branding
All signup form fields display correctly (Full Name, Email, Password, Confirm Password, Role)
Form validation works (password confirmation mismatch detection)
Mode switching between login/signup functions properly
Error messages display with proper styling and feedback
UI is responsive and visually correct
action_item_for_main_agent: Configure Supabase database: 1) Create profiles table with proper schema 2) Set up RLS policies for user access 3) Create trigger function with SECURITY DEFINER to handle new user profile creation 4) Test signup/login flow after database setup
